value.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Learn how to troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer.

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Artifacts, an Azure DevOps service, to set up a feed for sharing packages with your team. value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
value.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Use Visual Studio together with a test framework to create, deploy, and test an Azure Function.

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

value.title: Getting Started with Microsoft Identity
value.excerpt: Learn the basics of Microsoft identity including the different types of tokens, account types, and supported topologies.

value.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus
value.excerpt: Discover how to write code in .NET applications using Azure Service Bus for communications that can handle high demand, low bandwidth, and hardware failures.

value.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Learning from failure
value.excerpt: Learn about post-incident reviews, a practice necessary to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Incident response
value.excerpt: Learn the incident response fundamentals necessary to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.title: Introduction to App Center
value.excerpt: Explore Azure App services to find ways to simplify creation and integration as you build, distribute, test, and analyze usage of yours apps.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Data Factory
value.excerpt: Evaluate whether Azure Data Factory can help you integrate your data sources. Describe how Azure Data Factory can ingest data from on-premises, multiple-cloud and SaaS data sources.

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to Python
value.excerpt: Learn about the Python programming language, how to execute statements and scripts, declare variables, and create a basic Python app.

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Update Management to update virtual machines, verify agent connectivity, and use Azure Log Analytics in your cloud environment.

value.title: Enable identity protection in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Active Directory (AD) Identity Protection and ways to optimize the end-user experience while benefiting security.

value.title: Secure administrator accounts in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

value.title: Move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box family
value.excerpt: Learn how to move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box devices.

value.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location
value.excerpt: Learn how to provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location.
